name: Spiritomb
author: Shizurow
flavor_text: It was formed by uniting 108 spirits. It has been bound to the Odd Keystone to keep it from doing any mischief.

poke_power.name: Spooky Whirlpool
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Spiritomb from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Your opponent shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws 6 cards.

attacks.name: Color Tag
attacks.effect: Choose {G}{R}{W}{L}{P}{F}{D}{M} or {C} type. Put 1 damage counter on each Pokémon your opponent has in play of the type you chose.
